title: Three Hundred Tang Poems, Volume 2
creator: Various
description:
LibriVox recording of Three Hundred Tang Poems, Volume 2, in the public domain.
The LibriVox catalog page for this work lists the authors, the titles in English and the LibriVox readers. There are also links to the texts in Chinese and English. Compiled around 1763, 'Three Hundred Tang Poems' is the standard collection of the poetic art of the Tang Dynasty (618 to 907). Volume Two includes the styles 古言七诗 'seven character ancient verse' (poems 46 to 73) and 古乐府 'ancient folk-song styled verse' (poems 74 to 89). Recordings in this volume are in Cantonese, Hokkien, Mandarin and Taiwanese, as indicated in the titles. (Summary by David Barnes) For more information on LibriVox, or to volunteer, please see: http://librivox.org/
M4B format available
subject: chinese; tang; poem; poetry; li bai; du fu; wang wei; li shangyin; meng haoran; cen shen; cantonese; mandarin; hokkien; taiwanese
